channel.title: About on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in About on My New Hugo Site

item.title: About Me
item.description: Software Engineering runs in my family. My dad was a Sonarman in the Navy in the 70s and 80s when computers were beginning to be installed on Navy ships. As an avid reader and lifelong learner, my dad knew quite a bit about a lot of things, so when the sailors who were meant to work on the computers didn’t know how to troubleshoot the new equipment, dad stepped in and was able to quickly learn how the computer worked based on his experience in other electronic systems. As a reward of a job well done, dad’s commanding officer then asked him to write the manual for the device.
